item.title: My First C++ Program! [C++]
item.dc:creator: @Santa_Claus Santa Claus
item.description:
@Santa_Claus wrote:

Here is my first C++ program

I named it Eglifier because my biol teacher calls be eggy for some reason

and on popular demand “lin”

“And cause Lin named his program “Agifier”, so I got the ifier from it”

well here we go

[code]#include // Eglifier
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
puts(“Welcome to the Eglifier by Santa Claus!”);// Eglifier
puts(“I hope that you find a use for this…”);// Eglifier
puts(“because at the moment i have no idea…”);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();

int name;

printf(“How old are you? “);// Eglifier
scanf (”%s”,&name);// Eglifier
printf(“You’re %s years old thats cool im 15”,&name);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();

printf("Whats your favourite food?   ");// Eglifier

scanf ("%s",&name);// Eglifier
printf(“Your favourite food is %s, mine too!”,&name);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();

printf("Where you from?   ");// Eglifier

scanf ("%s",&name);// Eglifier
printf(“Your from %s, sweet thats cool!”,&name);// Eglifier
getchar();
getchar();
getchar();
return 0;

}[/code]

might do a v2 or make another program

dont flame first C++

Read full topic
